words.explanation: Refers to 'he' or 'him', in this context, it is likely referring to Jesus.
Past tense of 'to speak' or 'to talk'.
Preposition meaning 'to' or 'towards', indicating direction of the action.
Pronoun 'them', referring to the people Jesus was speaking to.
Means 'many', indicating a large number or quantity.
Plural form of 'thing' or 'matter', referring to various subjects or topics.
Plural form of 'parable', a simple story used to illustrate a moral or spiritual lesson.
Conjunction meaning 'and', used to connect words or phrases.
Past tense of 'to say' or 'to tell'.
An interjection meaning 'behold', 'see', or 'look', used to draw attention.
Indefinite article 'a' or 'an', here used before 'sower' to indicate any person in that role.
Noun meaning 'sower' or 'planter', referring to someone who sows seeds.
Past tense of 'to go' or 'to come out'.
Adverb meaning 'out' or 'outside', indicating movement from inside to outside.
Conjunction that can mean 'in order to', 'for the purpose of'.
Infinitive marker in Norwegian, used before verbs to form the infinitive tense.
To sow or to scatter seeds for the purpose of growing plants.
